TopicTitle: More on the topic of Kittopiatech

Articles.Content: I have kittopia working now, but I have little to no idea what I'm doing. Can anybody direct me to a good guide for kittopia? I have my config file set up, and I am only having problems with my textures.

I don't recall if you stated if you had read the mod thread or not, but that would usually be the best place to ask questions about a particular mod.   And then if you don't get an answer in due time, then start a new thread on it.    A lot of the questions you might have about a mod, have probably been already experienced by other users, and they might have discussed it there.

6 hours ago, Gargamel said:

I don't recall if you stated if you had read the mod thread or not, but that would usually be the best place to ask questions about a particular mod.   And then if you don't get an answer in due time, then start a new thread on it.    A lot of the questions you might have about a mod, have probably been already experienced by other users, and they might have discussed it there.  

Thanks for the redirection. I am still really new to this forum and haven't learned my way around yet.
